ikw:ProgramInformationData.ikw:ProgramName: InKnowWorks Contropolus:A WPF Frameworks and Ontology Reasoning Core, UI/UX and Eventing Services and Runtime

ikw:ShortProgramDescription.ikw:Para: Contropolus-PRIME is a Set of Advanced Technologies that make up the InKnowWorks Visual Knowledge Management Console (VKMC) Technology.
Contropolus-PRIME contains the foundations for what in time will become a WPF self-aware Reasoned-About and Dynamically Generated UI/UX
Knowledge Presentation Engine for the dynamic generation of XAML and C# code productions. These are the very early days of the technology
and so this version will change and evolve at a rapid and constant rate over the next two to 3 years.
The assemblage of component parts and is made-up of a Parallel Processing OWL-DL Ontology Reasoner outfitted to work specifically against the
WPF technology set; the purpose of the Reasoner is to compute agaisnt the WPF XAML Language and WPF Coded API and as well as any WPF written components.
Contropolus-PRIME works with the CathexusGEN Meta-programming runtime to generate Loose XAML and Native C# code at runtime; the code is
Dynamically Injected at runtime thus there is only a single notion of UI/UX computed happenings substantiated aginst the User's Operating Context.
There's a built-in Parallel-Tasking Taxomnomier, High Performance Graph-based Repository, Reactive Pub/Sub Eventing Engine, Reactive Event Streaming so much more. Take
Take a look at the Contropolus-PRIME Architecture Model Table hosted in this application.
